attributes.action: All people who are paid from government finances must be paid via PAYE
attributes.additional_details: As an ex armed forces pensioner and a person who has been forced to pay tax via PAYE all of my life I strongly believe that all people paid from taxpayers money should be accountable for the amount of tax they pay and using PAYE is the best way to achieve this.
attributes.background: In order to prevent the avoidance of tax through tax instruments all people who are employed by government and paid from public finances must be paid via PAYE

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not exactly sure what types of jobs you want this to apply to, as most public servants are paid using PAYE.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
